column4: Tesla up on surprise profit  reassurance on capital plans
column5: Tesla Motors Inc's shares rose more than 5 percent in early trading on Thursday as investors welcomed the electric car maker's first quarterly profit in more than three years and its reassurance that the Model 3 sedan would not need new capital.

column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla up on surprise profit  reassurance on capital plans
column5: Oct 27 Tesla Motors Inc's shares rose more than 5 percent in early trading on Thursday as investors welcomed the electric car maker's first quarterly profit in more than three years and its reassurance that the Model 3 sedan would not need new capital.

column4: Tesla up on surprise profit  reassurance on capital plans
column5: Oct 27 Tesla Motors Inc shares rose 5 percent in premarket trading on Thursday as investors welcomed the electric car maker's first quarterly profit in more than three years and its reassurance that the Model 3 sedan would not need new capital.

column4: Tesla turns profit  Musk says no new capital needed for Model 3
column5: SAN FRANCISCO Tesla Motors Inc  reported its first quarterly net profit in more than three years on Wednesday  buoyed by nearly $139 million in sales of clean car credits  and Chief Executive Elon Musk said the company could turn a profit again in the fourth quarter. | Video

column4: BRIEF-NXP Semiconductors will be obligated to pay to Qualcomm termination fee equal to $1.25 bln in cash if NXP enters superior proposal
column5: * Nxp semiconductors - nxp will be obligated to pay to qualcomm termination fee equal to $1.25 billion in cash if nxp to enters into superior proposal

column4: Qualcomm to buy NXP for $38 billion in biggest chip deal
column5: Smartphone chipmaker Qualcomm Inc  agreed to buy NXP Semiconductors NV  for about $38 billion in the biggest-ever deal in the semiconductor industry  making it the leading supplier to the fast-growing automotive chips market. | Video

column4: UPDATE 5-Qualcomm to buy NXP for $38 bln in biggest chip deal
column5: * Qualcomm shares up 4 pct  NXP up 1.4 pct   (Adds Breaking Views link  updates shares)
* Qualcomm Inc - Total enterprise value of approximately $47 billion

column4: Qualcomm to buy NXP Semiconductors for enterprise value of $47 bln
column5: Oct 27 Qualcomm Inc said on Thursday it had agreed to buy NXP Semiconductors NV for an enterprise value of about $47 billion  as it seeks to expand the reach of its chips from phones to cars.
